awards:
第69届柏林国际电影节(2019)
　　泰迪熊奖 最佳短片(提名) 扎拉·德温格
introduction: 一开始，看起来尤丽娅和朱丽叶在学校走廊上相遇，但后来我们注意到照片中的通风格栅，这对情侣必须通过通风格栅相互交谈。尤利亚和朱丽叶在监狱里。更糟的是，朱丽叶很快就会被释放。但尤利亚会怎么样呢？充满感情的德拉姆采取了激进和勇敢的转变。扎拉·德温格再次讲述了一个关于自决女性主角的简短而激烈的故事。在一个青少年犯罪中心，两个女孩在爱情中找到了慰藉。一旦其中一个被释放，他们就不知道如何处理这件事，他们都在寻找解决办法，并产生悲剧的后果——一个基于莎士比亚的《罗密欧与朱丽叶》动机的当代爱情故事。At first it seems like Yulia and Juliet are meeting in the school corridor, but then we notice the ventilation grilles in the image, through which the two lovers have to talk to each other. Yulia and Juliet are in prison. Worse still, Juliet will soon be released. But what will happen to Yulia? The emotionally charged drame takes a radical and brave turn. Zara Dwinger once again tells a brief, intense story about self-determined female protagonists.In a juvenile delinquent center two girls find comfort in love for each other. Once one of them gets released, they don't know how to deal with this and both seek for a solution, with tragic consequences - A contemporary love story based on the motives of Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet.
